mapper.insert: insert into question(user_idx, subject, title, content) values(#{user_idx}, #{subject}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select a.*, b.nickname as nickname, b.level_image as level_image from question as a join user as b on a.user_idx = b.idx where status = 0
mapper.update: update question set status = 1 where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select a.*, b.nickname as nickname, b.level_image as level_image from question as a join user as b on a.user_idx = b.idx where a.idx = #{idx}
